articles.author: Joseph Ziegler
articles.description: Roseburg begins a water main replacement Sept. 17 on SE Pine St. between Oak & Sykes. Expect lane closures 7 p.m.–6 a.m. through Sept. 24, then daytime work starting Sept. 29. Project may pause in winter. Info: 541-492-6730 or pwd@roseburgor.gov
articles.title: Roseburg to Begin Water Main Replacement Project on SE Pine Street

articles.author: Joseph Ziegler
articles.description: The Winston-Dillard Melon Festival returns Sept. 19–21 at Riverbend Park! 🎉 Join us for food, crafts, kids’ fun, and the parade on Sept. 20 at 11 a.m. (registration 10 a.m.). Vendors welcome - no insurance needed except food, weapons, or activity booths!
articles.title: Winston-Dillard Melon Festival Marks 56 Sweet Years of Tradition

articles.author: Joseph Ziegler
articles.description: September 9, 2025 marks five years since the Archie Creek Fire swept through Douglas County, burning 131,500 acres and destroying over 100 homes. Recovery continues as Glide reflects on loss, rebuilding, and resilience in the face of one of Oregon’s most devastating wildfires.
articles.title: Five Years After the Flames: Archie Creek Fire’s Enduring Mark on Glide

articles.author: Joseph Ziegler
articles.description: DFPA has lowered fire danger levels following recent rain. Effective Sept. 9, IFPL drops to Level 2 and Public Use Restrictions to Moderate across the district. Industrial and public activities face time-of-day limits to reduce wildfire risk. Full details at www.dfpa.net
articles.title: DFPA Lowers Fire Precaution Levels Following Rainfall

articles.author: Joseph Ziegler
articles.description: The Roseburg Receiver Morning Scoop
articles.title: September 9, 2025

articles.author: Joseph Ziegler
articles.description: Roseburg City Council will consider a fireworks ban at its Sept. 8 meeting. Fire staff cite recent local fires, rising wildfire risk, and impacts on veterans and pets. Options include drafting an ordinance this year, seeking more info, or taking no action at this time.
articles.title: Roseburg City Council Considers Fireworks Ban Following Recent Fire Risks

articles.author: News Staff
articles.description: The Douglas Forest Protective Association (DFPA) is actively responding to fires caused by recent lightning activity, forest officials said.
articles.title: Final mop-up underway for lightning-caused fires in Douglas County

articles.author: News Staff
articles.description: Firefighters are responding to several lightning-induced fires across the Douglas Forest Protective Association district following a storm on Monday, DFPA officials said.
articles.title: More Douglas County fires sparked by lightning storms

articles.description: The Douglas Forest Protective Association (DFPA) is actively responding to a lightning storm that hit the northern part of the district on Sunday, district officials said.
articles.title: DFPA crews fight lightning-sparked Douglas County fires
